Description: Mudstone (greywacke) cosmetic-palette of trapezoidal shape with rounded corners. Depression in centre on one side with vague green traces.
Curator's comments: Palette type like 88D in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery and Palettes (1921).
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (pl. xxix (tomb register))
Acquisition name: Donated by: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine
